name: Flaming Tail
effect: Deals 1d6 fire damage to creatures in a 5 ft. cone when the monster uses its tail attack.

name: Poison Spines
effect: Melee attackers take 1d6 poison damage when they hit the monster with a melee attack.

name: Crystal Skin
effect: The monster gains +2 AC against non-magical physical attacks.

name: Echoing Roar
effect: All creatures within 15 ft. must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution save or be deafened and have their speed halved until the start of the monster's next turn.

name: Chilling Touch
effect: Melee attacks reduce target’s speed by 10 ft. until the start of its next turn.

name: Electro Aura
effect: Creatures that hit the monster with melee attacks take 1d6 lightning damage.

name: Shadow Clone
effect: Once per short rest, the monster can create a duplicate that has 1 HP and confuses attackers (attack rolls against the clone have disadvantage).

name: Regenerative Flesh
effect: The monster regains 5 HP at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 HP.

name: Gravity Field
effect: All creatures within 10 ft. have their speed reduced by 10 ft. until the start of the monster’s next turn.

name: Spore Cloud
effect: Once per short rest, the monster can release spores in a 10 ft. radius. Creatures must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution save or be blinded until the start of the monster’s next turn.

name: Mirror Wings
effect: Ranged attacks against the monster reflect 1d4 damage back to the attacker.

name: Siphoning Gaze
effect: When the monster hits with a melee attack, it regains HP equal to 1d4 plus the monster's Constitution modifier.
